Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Hamlin
ShortDescription: #76 Diversey buses are rerouted in both directions via Diversey, Center Park, Fullerton, Pulaski and Diversey, due to police activity near Diversey/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Diversey, Center Park, Fullerton, Pulaski, then resume their normal route on Diversey.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to police activity near Diversey/Hamlin.
